text: Frank Francis Fasi (August 27, 1920 - February 3, 2010) was an American politician. He was the longest serving Mayor of Honolulu, Hawaii. He was mayor for 22 years. He also was a territorial senator and member of the Honolulu City Council. Fasi died on February 2010 in Honolulu at the age 89. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Mayors of Honolulu Category:Politicians from Connecticut Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Frank Fasi
